pageProduct.name: QV Face Gentle Cleansing Wipes
pageProduct.description:
General Information

Each moist towelette lifts dirt, oil and make-up, leaving your face feeling refreshed, moisturised and clean.  Free of fragrance, colour and alcohol, and suitable for sensitive skin.Safflower Oil replenishes moisture levels.  Vitamin E provides anti-oxidant benefits.  Instantly captures pore-clogging dirt & oil.  Removes make-up including waterproof mascara.  Fragrance and colour free.  Ophthalmologically tested.

Warnings

For external use only.  If irritation occurs, wash affected area and discontinue use.  Avoid eyes.  If product enters eyes flush well with water.

Common Uses

 Lifts dirt, oil and make-up.Removes make-up including waterproof mascara.  Suitable for sensitive skin.

Ingredients

Aqua (water), glycerin, paraffinum liquidum, glyceryl stearate, phenoxyethanol, ceteth-20, dimethicone, stearic acid, laureth-3, sodium methylparaben, tocopherol, carthamus tinctorius (safflower) seed oil, dichlorobenzyl alcohol, citric acid.

Directions

Intended for regular use.  Use QV Face Cleansing Wipes as a convenient way to cleanse, especially when you're on the go.  Gently wipe away dirt and make-up from the face with the towelette.
